Just had my daughter on Easter Monday! She’s a week old today. And holy cow. I could not have survived without those diapers or the earth mama spray. I just wanted to say, postpartum depression can come way later, a few months in, whereas babyblues is right away. I had both and they were very different. (for people reading this) The babyblues is teary and emotional- when I had PPD I did NOT cry.  I did not feel anything, enjoy anything. Also, while babyblues passes, depression does not necessarily and may require medical attention. (!)
